parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The full property address, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property. See [explanation of property types](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types)

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: squareFootage
parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

parameters.name: maxRadius
parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in miles

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: compCount
parameters.description: The number of comparable listings to use when calculating the rent estimate, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The full property address, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: longitude

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property. See [explanation of property types](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types)

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: squareFootage
parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

parameters.name: maxRadius
parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in miles

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: compCount
parameters.description: The number of comparable listings to use when calculating the value estimate, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The full address of the property, in the format of `Street, City, State, Zip`. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The name of the city, used to search for listings in a specific city. This parameter is case-sensitive

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The 2-character state abbreviation, used to search for listings in a specific state. This parameter is case-sensitive

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: The 5-digit zip code, used to search for listings in a specific zip code

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the search area in miles, with a maximum of 100. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property, used to search for listings matching this criteria. See [explanation of property types](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/property-types)

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Use `0` to indicate a studio layout

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current listing status, used to search for listings matching this criteria

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since a property was listed on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of listings to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first listing to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided. [Learn more](https://developers.rentcast.io/reference/pagination) about pagination

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the property listing to return
